content:
On the night of March 30, at about 00:25, Russian troops fired at the city of Selidovo Donetsk region with two C-300 missiles.

About thisreportedSelidovsk city military administration.

The shelling damaged 15 private residential buildings and power grids.

The administration added that there were no hostile shelling of the dead and victims.

As reported by the Armyinform, as a result of Russian attack by shock drones of the type of Shahd in the Poltava regiondamagedInfrastructure object.

At night, 12 shock UAV-136/131 punches were recorded, nine of themwas destroyedunits of mobile fire groups of Defense Forces of Ukraine.
title: The enemy fired at C-300 village missiles, 15 houses were damaged
description: This was reported by the Selidov City Military Administration. As a result of shelling ...
author: Army Inform
